    Class and Description
    org.locationtech.jts.algorithm.CGAlgorithms
    See Length, Area, Distance, Orientation, PointLocation
    org.locationtech.jts.noding.IntersectionFinderAdder
    see InteriorIntersectionFinderAdder
    org.locationtech.jts.operation.IsSimpleOp
    Replaced by org.locationtech.jts.operation.valid.IsSimpleOp
    org.locationtech.jts.noding.snapround.MCIndexSnapRounder
    Not robust. Use SnapRoundingNoder instead.
    org.locationtech.jts.operation.union.OverlapUnion
    due to impairing performance
    org.locationtech.jts.util.PriorityQueue 
    org.locationtech.jts.precision.SimpleGeometryPrecisionReducer
    use GeometryPrecisionReducer

    renamed to nearestLocations

    renamed to nearestPoints
    org.locationtech.jts.operation.distance.DistanceOp.closestPoints(Geometry, Geometry)
    renamed to nearestPoints
    org.locationtech.jts.algorithm.CGAlgorithms.computeOrientation(Coordinate, Coordinate, Coordinate)
    Use Orientation.index(Coordinate, Coordinate, Coordinate) instead.
    org.locationtech.jts.geom.GeometryFactory.createMultiPoint(Coordinate[])
    Use GeometryFactory.createMultiPointFromCoords(org.locationtech.jts.geom.Coordinate[]) instead
    org.locationtech.jts.algorithm.CGAlgorithms.distanceLineLine(Coordinate, Coordinate, Coordinate, Coordinate)
    Use Distance.segmentToSegment(Coordinate, Coordinate, Coordinate, Coordinate) instead.
    org.locationtech.jts.algorithm.CGAlgorithms.distancePointLine(Coordinate, Coordinate[])
    Use Distance.pointToSegmentString(Coordinate, Coordinate[]) instead.
    org.locationtech.jts.algorithm.CGAlgorithms.distancePointLine(Coordinate, Coordinate, Coordinate)
    Use Distance.pointToSegment(Coordinate, Coordinate, Coordinate) instead.
    org.locationtech.jts.algorithm.CGAlgorithms.distancePointLinePerpendicular(Coordinate, Coordinate, Coordinate)
    Use Distance.pointToLinePerpendicular(Coordinate, Coordinate, Coordinate) instead.
    org.locationtech.jts.geom.util.GeometryExtracter.extract(Geometry, Class)
    Use GeometryExtracter.extract(Geometry, String)
    org.locationtech.jts.geom.util.GeometryExtracter.extract(Geometry, Class, List)
    Use GeometryExtracter.extract(Geometry, String, List)
    org.locationtech.jts.algorithm.MinimumBoundingCircle.getFarthestPoints()
    use #getMaximumDiameter()
    org.locationtech.jts.geom.PrecisionModel.getOffsetX()
    Offsets are no longer used
    org.locationtech.jts.geom.PrecisionModel.getOffsetY()
    Offsets are no longer used
    org.locationtech.jts.algorithm.HCoordinate.intersection(Coordinate, Coordinate, Coordinate, Coordinate)
    use Intersection.intersection(Coordinate, Coordinate, Coordinate, Coordinate)
    org.locationtech.jts.algorithm.CGAlgorithms.isCCW(Coordinate[])
    Use Orientation.isCCW(Coordinate[]) instead.
    org.locationtech.jts.algorithm.CGAlgorithms.isOnLine(Coordinate, Coordinate[])
    Use PointLocation.isOnLine(Coordinate, Coordinate[]) instead.
    org.locationtech.jts.algorithm.CGAlgorithms.isPointInRing(Coordinate, Coordinate[])
    Use PointLocation.isInRing(Coordinate, Coordinate[]) instead.
    org.locationtech.jts.operation.IsSimpleOp.isSimple(LineString)
    use isSimple()
    org.locationtech.jts.operation.IsSimpleOp.isSimple(MultiLineString)
    use isSimple()
    org.locationtech.jts.operation.IsSimpleOp.isSimple(MultiPoint)
    use isSimple()
    org.locationtech.jts.algorithm.CGAlgorithms.length(CoordinateSequence)
    Use Length.ofLine(CoordinateSequence) instead.
    org.locationtech.jts.algorithm.CGAlgorithms.locatePointInRing(Coordinate, Coordinate[])
    Use PointLocation.locateInRing(Coordinate, Coordinate[]) instead.
    org.locationtech.jts.algorithm.CGAlgorithms.orientationIndex(Coordinate, Coordinate, Coordinate)
    Use Orientation.index(Coordinate, Coordinate, Coordinate) instead.
    org.locationtech.jts.geom.Envelope.overlaps(Coordinate)
    Use #intersects instead.
    org.locationtech.jts.geom.Envelope.overlaps(double, double)
    Use #intersects instead.
    org.locationtech.jts.geom.Envelope.overlaps(Envelope)
    Use #intersects instead. In the future, #overlaps may be changed to be a true overlap check; that is, whether the intersection is two-dimensional.
    org.locationtech.jts.algorithm.LineIntersector.setMakePrecise(PrecisionModel)
    use setPrecisionModel instead
    org.locationtech.jts.algorithm.CGAlgorithms.signedArea(Coordinate[])
    Use Area.ofRing(Coordinate[]) or Area.ofRingSigned(Coordinate[]) instead.
    org.locationtech.jts.algorithm.CGAlgorithms.signedArea(CoordinateSequence)
    Use Area.ofRing(CoordinateSequence) or Area.ofRingSigned(CoordinateSequence) instead.
    org.locationtech.jts.geom.PrecisionModel.toExternal(Coordinate)
    no longer needed, since internal representation is same as external representation
    org.locationtech.jts.geom.PrecisionModel.toExternal(Coordinate, Coordinate)
    no longer needed, since internal representation is same as external representation
    org.locationtech.jts.geom.PrecisionModel.toInternal(Coordinate)
    use makePrecise instead
    org.locationtech.jts.geom.PrecisionModel.toInternal(Coordinate, Coordinate)
    use makePrecise instead
    org.locationtech.jts.util.StringUtil.toString(double)
    use OrdinateFormat
